name: Practice Driving Bus: Future C
description:
Practice Driving Bus: Future City is the latest bus driving simulation game that will help you become the best bus driver. Get behind the wheel of the bus and drive around the big open world city to complete all the routes!
FEATURES:
- Real life traffic
- Beautiful city environment
- Challenging missions
- Different grand buses to drive
- Realistic bus physics
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Realistic bus interiors
- Realistic game sound effects
- Easy steering wheel, buttons and tilting controls
